Mime-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed
From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>



* Iron Raptor read page after page of the BOOK OF SHADOWS, there were battle 
techniques that have never been seen before, there were weapons that bots 
never even knew existed, but best of all...there was a copy of the original 
Book of Primus.
This is what she had been looking for, nothing outrageously special...just 
the words of the ancient Autobots and Deceptacons.
Iron Raptor read eagerly until she came to the end of the last sentence of 
the book, it was then that she closed the glowing pages and relatched the 
latch.
She got to her feet and placed it back on the shelf, there were so many 
others but that was all the reading she was going to do today...it was time 
to check and see how Iris was holding up.
Iron Raptor walked to the door but turned and looked at the black box, she 
wondered what Liono kept inside of it but that was all she did...wonder.
She walked out of the room and made sure that the door closed behind her, it 
was then that she made her way to her quarters.
Once there Iron Raptor sat at her computer console and turned on the 
screen...*

" Iris?"
*The star comes onto the screen*
IRIS: "Yes, what's up?"

*Iron Raptor sighed and leaned back in her chair*

" How is everything holding up?"
IRIS: "The defence systems are fully powered and everything's functioning 
fine."

* Iron Raptor looked away.*
" That's good to hear. Just be ready to activate fully if the Ark gets too 
damaged."
IRIS: " Alright. Now, if you'll excuse me...I'm going to get back to 
monitoring the systems. Bye."

* The star disappears from the screen and the screen goes blank, Iron Raptor 
sat silently thinking about the battle to come.*
